name: Cyonaxin
movement: walking speed of 50 feet and swimming speed of 20 feet
description: Cyonaxin is a medium-sized celestial creature known for its chaotic good nature, possessing a sleek form that emphasizes agility and grace. It excels in mobility and can maneuver effectively thanks to its superior speed.
memorable: Cyonaxin serves as a protector and ally, with abilities that enhance its allies and hinder foes. Its unique powers allow it to support and liberate others in battle.
goals: To protect and support allies, liberating those in need.
relations: Allied with other celestial beings and creatures in need of protection.
environment: Found in various terrains, often where aid is needed.
strengths: Superior mobility, multiple support abilities, and resistance to poison and radiant damage.
weaknesses: Relatively low damage resistance against certain physical attacks.
attacks: Multiattack consisting of a powerful Bite and swift Claw attacks, both augmented by radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Liberating Churr empowers allies by granting them enhanced movement abilities and combat efficiency.
senses: Cyonaxin has keen sensory capabilities with advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell, making it highly perceptive.
skills: Effective at resisting magical effects due to Magic Resistance, giving it an advantage on saving throws against spells.
additional_information: Resistant to both poison and radiant damage.
Immunities to paralysis, poison, and stunning effects.
Can evade damage from certain effects with Evasion.
Ability to knock foes prone with Pounce if it charges at them.
Possesses Blur of Motion, making it harder for ranged attacks to hit.
test_queries: agile medium-sized creature with support abilities
protector with high mobility and radiant attacks
